author: coder-amey
body:
Hello, @franzoni, @arunhep, @lpernie and @ggovi.

@ravindkv and I have inserted the following new attributes to the LHCInfo class:
From CTPPS (6):
std::vector<std::string> lhcState
std::vector<std::string> lhcComment
std::vector<std::string> ctppsStatus
std::vector<unsigned int> lumiSection
std::vector<float> xingAngle
std::vector<cond::Time_t> dipTime

From ECAL (4):
std::vector<float> beam1VC
std::vector<float> beam2VC
std::vector<float> beam1RF
std::vector<float> beam2RF

I request you to kindly scrutinize our work and provide us with your valuable suggestions so that we can improve this pull request and get it merged.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
Amey & Ravindra.
title: Added the CTPPS & ECAL attributes to CondFormats/LHCInfo
